content:
Prev: Pyromaniacs on the beach, III Up: Ft. Bragg Fireworks Next: Noyo Harbor

Todd Point



We failed to meet Simon and family, because they went all the way out to the point while we stayed further in.
Taken Saturday, July 06, 2002, 09:11:33pm.  Original image size: 2969x1979, 7.2Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/25s @ F2.8, ISO 800, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 140mm (224mm equiv)
PS6 Colin 3.0 Medium 20:1:220, Copy R, Curves L 5:0 - 15:20 - 30:35 - 100:100,
Curves B 0:0 - 70:50 - 115:100 - 255:255, Levels 0:0.9:255, R 0:1.4:255, DV high,
Paste R, Level, USM 200:1:5, D60ISOR 1000 low, Blur sky 8
